ValidationRule.description: Require Location Details for Program Without Pathway Product Requests when marking the Design stage as complete.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Program_Without_Pathway', Product_Request__r.Product_Specification__r.RecordType.DeveloperName = 'OPE', ISBLANK( Location_Details__c ), Mark_Design_Stage_as_Complete__c = true, OR ( ISPICKVAL( Delivery_Type__c,'Face To Face' ), ISPICKVAL( Delivery_Type__c,'Blended' ) ) )
